review_data.title: Now called Oscars
review_data.content: Decent food for the price for Zurich. Right next to the NH Zurich airport hotel. Has more than just pizza. Plenty of Medetaranian choices as well.

review_data.title: Döner
review_data.content: Sehr guter Döner. Sehr freundliche Bedienung. Feiner Kaffee. Komme gerne wieder um hier etwas zu essen.

review_data.title: Good for price
